Man accused of murdering James Whitikau Barton in Stoke appears in courthttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/man-accused-of-murdering-james-whitikau-barton-in-stoke-appears-in-court/ABJ7PZWQJZAYRG5WGUROPM6W4I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/man-accused-of-murdering-james-whitikau-barton-in-stoke-appears-in-court/ABJ7PZWQJZAYRG5WGUROPM6W4I/ Tracy NealThe man was charged with murder after a fatal attack in Stoke last month. Fri, 01 Dec 2023 03:53:16 +0000 James Whitikau Barton was fatally assaulted in Stoke, Nelson, last month. The man accused of his murder appeared in the Nelson District Court today.

Fri, 01 Dec 2023 03:31:10 +0000 Auckland Council has distanced itself from a vote by the Waiheke Local Board to fly a Palestinian flag, while the Jewish Council raised concerns the vote failed to acknowledge Hamas atrocities and went beyond the remit for local government entities.
